title: WTB:Need help w/ last T206 needed -Tinker Bat Off
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: WTB:Need help w/ last T206 needed -Tinker Bat Off
posts.post_content:
Looking to complete my T206 Cubs subset again.  I only need the Tinker w/ bat off.  Paperloss on the back is fine but prefer none or very minimal on the front.  This is for display purposes only.

You can PM me or email at [url]esharpwork@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,

Eric
bump for last card needed.  Thanks Mr. Horst for the Chance.
Wish I saw this earlier, there was one on Ebay tonight.
Kit Young cards just put one up on their web site for $110. No idea how the back looks, but the front sounds like it will suit your needs.
